title: From Small-Town Mayor to IOC Front-Runner: The Unstoppable Rise of the UCI’s David Lappartient
content:
'He’s a consummate politician': Lappartient's fast track from town hall towards world sport's top job in less than a decade is astonishing.

Read the full article at From Small-Town Mayor to IOC Front-Runner: The Unstoppable Rise of the UCI’s David Lappartient on Velo.
author: ahood
